name: VentricularAssistDevicePlacement
title: Ventricular Assist Device placement
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains procedures used to identify ventricular assist device placement.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify procedures for ventricular assist device placement. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Procedure, Performed data type.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes that describe procedures including replacement, repair, implantation and insertion of heart assist devices.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes  not described in the inclusion criteria for ventricular assist device placement.)

concept.display: Implantation of total internal biventricular heart replacement system
Implantation or insertion of biventricular external heart assist system
Insertion of temporary non-implantable extracorporeal circulatory assist device
Implant of single ventricular (extracorporeal) external heart assist system
Insertion of implantable heart assist system
Insertion of percutaneous external heart assist device

contains.display: Implantation of total internal biventricular heart replacement system
Implantation or insertion of biventricular external heart assist system
Insertion of temporary non-implantable extracorporeal circulatory assist device
Implant of single ventricular (extracorporeal) external heart assist system
Insertion of implantable heart assist system
Insertion of percutaneous external heart assist device
